short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a 'Sort Channels' link to YouTube's subscriptions list after 'Show More' for easy sorting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Problem:
When you expand your YouTube subscriptions using 'Show More', the list appears in a random order, making it difficult to navigate among your channels. 

Our Solution:
'YouTube Channel Sorter' adds a 'Sort Channels' link immediately after you click 'Show More'. 
Simply click this link to sort your channels, helping you quickly find the ones you're looking for.
